## Type of Change

- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] IIIF standard compliance improvement

## Accessibility Testing
<!-- For UI changes, verify accessibility compliance -->
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works correctly
- [ ] Screen reader compatibility verified
- [ ] ARIA labels and roles are appropriate
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] Focus indicators are visible

## Code Quality Checklist
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review of the code has been performed
- [ ] Code is commented, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] JSDoc comments added for new public methods
- [ ] No console.log statements left in production code
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate and user-friendly

## Testing Checklist
- [ ] New code has been tested locally
- [ ] Existing functionality still works
- [ ] Edge cases have been considered
- [ ] Performance impact has been assessed
- [ ] No browser console errors

## Documentation
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code comments are clear and helpful
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if applicable)

## Iframe Integration Testing
<!-- For changes affecting iframe functionality -->
- [ ] PostMessage communication works correctly
- [ ] Parent window integration tested
- [ ] URL parameter handling works
- [ ] Cross-origin functionality verified
